newsitem.title: USA: IONA Technologies IPO range raised - underwriter.
newsitem.headline: IONA Technologies IPO range raised - underwriter.

text.p: The estimated price range on IONA Technologies Ltd's initial public offering has been raised to $16 to $18 per American Depositary Share (ADS) from an initial range of $14.50 to $16.50, said underwriter Lehman Brothers.
The deal consists of a global offering of 7.65 million ADSs, of which 6.12 million ADSs are to be offered in the United States and Canada. Each ADS represents the right to receive one ordinary share.
Dublin, Ireland-based IONA is a provider of software products that enable the development, integration and management of network-based applications in multi-platform computing environments.
The deal is expected to make its debut this week under the symbol IONAY.O on the Nasdaq.
